main: ^I was s-s-starting to think I’d never see anyone again… besides that scary guy. The chains are really h-heavy. Can you
^Oh wow... that feels way better. Ah, your face! You look so hungry, are you o-ok?

c-0: ^If I weren't so focused on escaping, the hunger would be all I could think about.
^Wait... I have a granola bar in my pocket still! It's not m-much, but maybe it'll give you some energy.
^Thanks... but it doesn't look very appetizing. I'll get a bite to eat after we get out of here without that psycho
^Ah, okay. No worries. It has been in my pocket for while.
c-1: ^Wow, what a lifesaver. You're always so thoughtful, Liam, thank you.
^I was more worried about you. I'll be fine, so don’t worry about me, Liam.
^That's a relief. I guess this experience has taken a toll on me, too...

note: ^Well, you should t-take a look at this. I found this scrap of paper between the couch cushions:
^<color=#FF1E35>“The children wear it like it means something. And it does— to it. It’s how it gets permission to devour</color>
^<color=#FF1E35>them, soul and all.”</color> God, can you imagine being e-e-eaten? What if this thing is real? O-or maybe this guy is a

c-0: ^That does sound really scary. It's going to be okay though, Liam. I'll won't let anything bad happen to you. Come
c-1: ^Do you believe in the Boogie Man too, Liam? There's no way something like that exists. And we already knew this
^guy was crazy, let's not stick around to see if he takes a bite out of us. You coming?
g-0: ^Right behind you. I trust you. YOUR CURRENT EVIL LEVEL:
